data.name: marriedbook Interactive: Pre-Order üíç
data.detailed_description:
marriedbook


About the Game

About marriedbook:



Purpose: Marriedbook Interactive offers "self help" programs and applications for married, engaged or newly wedded couples. When you download the application to your PC, you will get access to all of marriedbook's "self help" applications for married or engaged couples. *All progress and data is saved on your PC locally and is 100% private.

Access Includes:






You can also create your account on Marriedbook's online platform, create and update your private marriage album, profile, pages and personal experiences. Marriedbook is designed to encourage team work, a stronger more intimate bond with your spouse while also providing solutions and unique activities for couples.

Duration: Our self help programs lasts an average of 4 weeks each but can be continued longer or re-visted at any time. You can update your album or pages for as long as you keep your account. There are no monthly fees or hidden costs associated with your account. One time payment for lifetime access. New applications and updates are added at no additional cost.

Achievements and Awards: There are merit points and badges you earn as you progress in any of our applications. You also gain experience points, level up your progress and gain award badges as you add content to your book. Encourage one another, share those special moments with each other and build your memories together, just the both of you. The journey is yours.

*Marriedbook Interactive is not a therapist nor is it created by licensed therapists. Developed by a couple of over 20 years of marriage, marriedbook provide "self help" applications designed to help guide couples into reflection, self development and cooperation. Progress and results are based upon each couple's willingness to work together. We make no claims or guarantees for any personal success or prevention of failure.

Features Include:



  • Interactive: Self Help Programs for married couples.
  • Love & Romance Interactive and Love Boot Camp comes included.
  • Your Personal Profile Book: You can build your memories and special moments over time, post memories on your wall and timeline, upload photos, build albums, post videos and create a catalog of your special moments.
  • Award Progress: Gain experience points, level up your progress and gain award badges as you add content to your book and/or community.
  • marriedbook magazine: Articles including Married Tips and Helpful Content.

data.short_description: Marriedbook is a digital book of memories, a self help interactive platform, community and marital content source exclusively for married, engaged or newly wedded couples.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista 7/8/10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or 1.80 GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista 7/8/10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 1.8 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
